articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit 985
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit 985

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the Command of KPA Unit 985.
					
					 He received a salute from the commanding officers and looked round a room devoted to the unit's history, conducted by them.
					
					 He recalled with deep emotion the militant path covered by the unit, remembering soldiers of Paek Kye Sun's company he met during his visit to the unit with President Kim Il Sung in March 1966 and watching a photo the President had taken with an ordinary soldier.
					
					 After acquainting himself with the unit's performance of duty, he went round a military lecture room to watch its commanding officers and staff members in training.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all the commanding officers and staff members of the unit are getting ready to creditably perform their duties under any unexpected circumstances through their effective training of thoroughly arming themselves with the Juche-oriented military idea of strategy and tactics set forth by the WPK.
					
					 Then he toured the servicepersons' hall and a library to learn about the political and ideological education of them and dropped in at a mess hall to take care of the diet of soldiers directly under the unit as their real parents would do.
					
					 Watching carefully one by one the staple and non-staple food on the cooking-stand, he learned in detail about the unit's bean farming this year, the amount of bean service for the soldiers a day and the supply of meat.
					
					 He went to the Koagol revolutionary site situated in the area where the unit is stationed.
					
					 He recollected with deep emotion the immortal feats the President performed by foiling the "new offensive" of the U.S. imperialists with his farsighted wisdom and gifted military strategy to open a turning phase in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He praised the unit's soldiers for making their full devotions to preserve the site associated with the giant footprints of the President in its original state.
					
					 Highly estimating once again all the servicepersons of the unit for keeping sharp vigilance against the enemies' moves for aggression to creditably perform their guard duty, he set forth the important tasks to be carried out by the unit in increasing its combat capability in every way:
					
					 The unit should intensify combat training in atmosphere of real war to reliably prepare all the commanding officers and soldiers to be versatile commanders and fighters who uphold the Songun will of the WPK with arms.
					
					 It is necessary to improve the commanding and management of the unit and establish the strong military discipline and thus fully demonstrate the militant spirit and might of elite revolutionary army.
					
					 He had a picture taken with servicepersons of the unit.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Kim Kyong Ok, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Hwang Pyong So, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Kwangdok Pig Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Kwangdok Pig Farm

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Kwangdok Pig Farm.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, and Kim Kyong Ok, first vice department director of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was briefed on the farm before a map showing its panoramic view. Then he went to a room devoted to the farm's history where he looked back with deep emotion on the glorious course covered by the farm under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The President visited the newly built farm on November 30, 1971 and indicated the path to be taken by the farm, Kim Jong Il said, adding the every corner of the country is associated with the efforts of the President dedicated to the army and people.
					
					 Going round several places including a combined control room, fattening pen and breeding pen, Kim Jong Il learned in detail about technological updating, technical equipment, breeding and management and meat processing.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction with the fact that the party members and other working people of the farm are increasing meat and processed meat production after finishing the huge technological updating and modernization project in a brief span of time. He highly estimated their feats.
					
					 He dropped in at Fattening Pen No. 9 which was visited by the President. Very pleased to see swarms of fat pigs, he said it is important to set up air conditioning and ventilation system in pig pens.
					
					 At the breeding pen with the capacity of 20 000 piglets a year, he learned about breeding pigs and ways of cross-breeding.
					
					 He estimated the farm for having put the production on a normal footing based on protein insect breeding center suited to the conditions of the farm.
					
					 Greatly satisfied with the processed meat production base which can produce more than 200 tons of canned pork, salamis and sausages a year, he called for producing more canned pork and other processed meat specially favored by soldiers.
					
					 He repeatedly expressed satisfaction over the fact that the officials and employees of the farm have put the production of pork on a scientific and intensive basis as required by the new century and laid a solid foundation for improving the diet of the soldiers. He set forth important tasks for the management and operation of the farm.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the officials and employees of the farm would strive to implement the WPK's policy of stock-breeding and thus supply soldiers with more meat and processed meat.

articles.title: Those from South Hamgyong Province Feted
articles.content:
Those from South Hamgyong Province Feted

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea hosted a banquet in honor of officials, labor innovators, scientists and technicians from South Hamgyong Province at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday. 
					
					 Present there together with them were Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and other officials of the C.C., the WPK. 
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said at the banquet that General Secretary Kim Jong Il showed such warm benevolence that innovators in South Hamgyong Province could tour different places and enjoy art performances and provided this banquet for them. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il led them to work in a big and broad way while continuing ceaseless journey of on-the-spot guidance and turned the credit for all the achievements to them, the speaker noted, adding:
					
					 Those from South Hamgyong Province should cherish Kim Jong Il's trust and love and creditably carry out the tasks given by him, sharing the idea, intention, feeling and fortune with him. 
					
					 All of them should become forerunners in the sacred drive to improve the standard of people's living and open the gate to a thriving nation and thus live up to his deep trust. 
					
					 An art performance was given at the banquet by the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe.

articles.title: Those from South Hamgyong Province Tour Various Places of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Those from South Hamgyong Province Tour Various Places of Pyongyang

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Officials, labor innovators, scientists and technicians from South Hamgyong Province Saturday visited the Tudan Duck Farm, the Pyongyang Textile Mill and the Raknang Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory.
					
					 Employees of those industrial establishments warmly welcomed the visitors, giving bouquets and putting garlands around their necks as they performed miracles and feats in their sites, bringing joy to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They went to the Tudan Duck Farm.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and looked round dozens of duck houses, an incubation room, open-air ground for duck, the base for the production of ferment food and animal protein feed, duck smoke house, scientific and technological information center and other places of the farm.
					
					  They were admired to watch all the production processes automated and computerized and a high level of cultured practices in production and life. 
					
					They enjoyed a performance given by members of the art squad of the Pyongyang Poultry Guidance Bureau.
					
					 They also visited the Pyongyang Textile Mill where they went round various places associated with the inerasable traces of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They were guests at the Raknang Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory.

articles.title: Huichon Power Station Construction Medal Instituted
articles.content:
Huichon Power Station Construction Medal Instituted

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Huichon Power Station construction medal has been instituted in the DPRK to hand down the feats of those who built grand edifice, to be brilliantly recorded in the history of building a thriving nation, by displaying the indomitable spirit and mass heroism.
					
					 A decision of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly was released in this regard on Friday.

articles.title: Order of Kim Il Sung Awarded to KPISF Unit
articles.content:
Order of Kim Il Sung Awarded to KPISF Unit 

					 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on Wednesday issued a decree on awarding Order of Kim Il Sung to Unit 3154 of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					
					 The unit has creditably carried out its honorable duty as the genuine defender and creator of people's happiness by perfecting important projects to be monumental edifices as required by the Songun era in the DPRK.

articles.title: Title of Labor Hero Conferred on Merited Officials in DPRK
articles.content:
Title of Labor Hero Conferred on Merited Officials in DPRK

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Wednesday issued a decree on awarding the DPRK title of Labor Hero on Ri Ryong Ha, Ri Pyong Sam, Pak Chun Hong, Kim Ung Chol and Pak Yong Mu.
					
					 They have made signal contribution to perfecting edifices of weighty significance in the improvement of people's living standard and building of an economic power.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group's Fascist Suppression of Youth and Students Lambasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group's Fascist Suppression of Youth and Students Lambasted

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Youth and Students Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public a statement on Saturday slamming the south Korean group of traitors for intensifying the fascist crackdown on members of the patriotic youth and students' organizations who took the lead in the actions for independence, democracy and reunification in south Korea.
					
					 The statement branded this brutal suppression by the puppet group as a wanton challenge to the aspiration and desire of all the Koreans and an intolerable act of blocking the discussions on reunification and activities for it.
					
					 It is treating as criminals those concerned of the youth and students organizations, who legally got in touch with those of the DPRK with the permission of the former "government", after bringing against them false charges that they received "instructions" from somebody after the lapse of several years. This glaringly shows how frantic it has become in its moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots and conspiratorial operations. 
					
					 The horrifying whirlwind of brutal fascist crackdown kicked off by the group is intended to create a horror-ridden  atmosphere in the south Korean society and put down the struggle of the youth and students standing in the van of the movement for independence, democracy and reunification in a bid to tide over its serious ruling crisis and stay in power. 
					
					 But this will only touch off bitter resentment among the youth and students and other people at the group as it is nothing but death-bed frenzy of those thrown into a dilemma after being forsaken by the public for its bankrupt policy of confrontation with the DPRK and sycophantic, traitorous and unpopular policies. 
					
					All the youth and students in the south should join hands with broad strata of people of all social standings and wage more dynamic actions as vanguard in the struggle for making a clean sweep of the group of traitors.
					
					 The puppet group should halt at once the crackdown on patriotic youth and students and other people.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Bureau of Earthquake headed by Director Jang Jong Nam left here by train on Saturday to visit China.
					
					 Meanwhile, the delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam led by Hoang Binh Quan, chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of the Party Central Committee, and delegations of China and Taipei of China which had attended the 7th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair left here for home by air and train. 
					
					 Earlier, delegations of Germany, Sweden, Switzerland and France went back.

articles.title: KCNA Delegation Comes Back Home from China
articles.content:
KCNA Delegation Comes Back Home from China

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Korean Central News Agency led by Director General Kim Pyong Ho came back home by air on Saturday after visiting China.

articles.title: Mansudae Area Construction Nears Completion
articles.content:
Mansudae Area Construction Nears Completion

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Structural construction of skyscraping and high-rise apartment blocks were completed earlier than scheduled, providing a sure guarantee for finishing the overall project in the Mansudae area in a brief span of time. 
					
					 The soldier-builders of the Korean People's Army finished the exterior and interior plastering of the skyscraping apartment block in the wake of the completion of its structural construction through a three-dimensional drive. They are now showing a good result in tile-setting.
					
					 The shock-brigade members under the construction regiment of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, too, rounded off the structural construction of a 40-story apartment building with youth energy and wisdom. 
					
					 The 1st and 2nd regiments of the construction brigade under the Ministry of People's Security carried out their assignment in time by preceding the formwork-setting and keeping other processes in good order.
					
					 Encouraged at the working spirit of the soldier-builders, the builders of the Ryongsan construction division and the Taedonggang construction brigade are pushing the structural assembling at the final stage.

articles.title: DPRK Team Wins Football Match with Brazilian Team
articles.content:
DPRK Team Wins Football Match with Brazilian Team

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A men's football match was held between the Pothonggang team of the DPRK and the Atletico Sorocaba Club team of Brazil at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Saturday.
					
					 The Pothonggang team won the match 2:0, one goal in the first half and the other in the second half.
					
					 The Brazilian team had matches with DPRK teams in Pyongyang in November 2009 and October 2010.

articles.title: Central Zoo Provides New Facility to Visitors
articles.content:
Central Zoo Provides New Facility to Visitors

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Cars are available for visitors to the Central Zoo thanks to a step taken by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who always pays deep attention to the cultural and emotional life of the people. They are open battery cars manufactured by Korean workers. They are good in performance and convenient for driving. 
					
					 An about one hour drive by those diverse colored attractive cars brings visitors to every corner of the zoo covering more than 100 hectares.

articles.title: Jagang Province Takes on Appearance of Socialist Land of Bliss
articles.content:
Jagang Province Takes on Appearance of Socialist Land of Bliss 

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The appearance of Jagang Province in the DPRK is changing day by day in the era of Songun. 
					
					 Officials and other working people in the province are reporting successes in the land and city management. 
					
					 Hundreds of kilometers of roads in the province have been paved or repaired and the areas around them spruced up successfully. 
					
					 The appearance of Ryongrim County has changed beyond recognition. The people of the county built a county cultural house, swimming pool, noodle house, public service facilities and more than a thousand new dwelling houses appeared in the township. 
					
					 The people in Kanggye and Manpho paved tens of km of roads or improved them, built new houses and carried out tens of thousands of square meters of roofing, drastically changing their appearance. 
					
					 Usi County was seriously destroyed by natural disaster last year. But, the people there built hundreds of new houses, a park and swimming pool and decorated streets with lights in a peculiar manner in a matter of less than one year. 
					
					 Officials and other working people in Chosan County turned out as one and built catering and public service facilities in a short span of time and constructed modern socialist villages in different parts of the county. 
					
					 Huichon City and Tongsin, Junggang, Janggang, Wiwon, Hwaphyong, Rangrim, Songgan, Jonchon and Songwon counties painted all the buildings with bright colors, laid out green belts, covered catering network with new tiles and installed street-lamps, dramatically changing their looks.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression under Fire

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- South Korea is swept by waves of horrifying fascist suppression with the Seoul mayoral election close at hand.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a by-lined article.
					
					 The successive conservative forces of south Korea have maintained their "power", resorting to the fascist suppression, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 All the policies of the conservative forces are characterized by their unpopular and treacherous nature and their main ruling method is to resort to the fascist suppression of the people's will and wishes at the point of bayonet.
					
					 The "Grand National Party" suffered a bitter debacle in the elections last year and this year, hated and forsaken by the people. It is now becoming vociferous about "cleanup" and "change" in a bid to win popularity.
					
					 The conservative authorities replaced bosses of judicature including the president of the Supreme Court and the chief prosecutor with ill-famed fascist elements before the above-said election. Meanwhile, they have reinforced their repressive system and forces as evidenced by the massive bolstering of the National Intelligence Service, prosecution and police and the restoration of the "council for security measures" in the period of the military dictatorship, etc.
					
					 Facing the worst ruling crisis, denounced by the people, the conservative group is now seeking a way out of it in intensifying the fascist suppression. By creating a terror-ridden atmosphere under the pretext of "security" through the racket of brutal crackdown the group seeks to put down the daily mounting anti-"government" struggle of people of various circles and block the advance of the forces for democratic reforms. Its immediate aim is to carry out the Seoul mayoral "election" and, furthermore, "National Assembly election" and the "presidential election" next year in a bid to stay in power.
					
					 The conservative group's fascist suppression should be condemned as reckless anti-reunification acts to quell the people's daily growing desire for achieving reunification through alliance with the north and escalate the confrontation with the north.
					
					 This is, however, nothing but the last-ditch efforts of those who lived out their days.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Chief Executive's Visit to U.S. Humiliating Junket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Chief Executive's Visit to U.S. Humiliating Junket

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive's junket to the U.S. was a humiliating trip as it brought into bolder relief his true colors as a pro-U.S. sycophant.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a by-lined commentary.
					
					 The chief executive, while visiting the U.S., should have blamed it for the GIs' sexual assaults against girl students as their crimes are becoming more rampant than ever before but he put his good face on his American master, keeping mum about the cases, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 It is very ridiculous for the chief executive to claim that the south Korea-U.S. "alliance has developed", talking about FTA. His recent trip to the U.S. was, to all intents and purposes, a disgraceful and treacherous junket as he put everything including economy and the people's right to existence at its disposal. Accustomed to living in reliance on the U.S., he did not hesitate to talk nonsense before Koreans in the U.S., urging them to "work hard as Americans" while defiling the people's just struggle. These reckless remarks proved that he is steeped in pro-Americanism and flunkeyism, bereft of the soul of the Korean nation.
					
					 During his U.S. junket he brought to light his despicable true colors as a nuclear war servant for his master. He challenged the domestic and foreign public call for "a switchover in his policy towards the north", hailing with his both hands the U.S. nuclear racket against the DPRK. This is a criminal act to mar the atmosphere of dialogue on the Korean Peninsula and push the situation to the brink of war. He visited even the U.S. Department of Defense to have the "defence commitment" confirmed by his American master. This was nothing but a revelation of his scenario for aggression to do harm to fellow countrymen, backed by outside forces.
					
					 He considered the briefing on the situation on the peninsula for him at the Department of Defense during his recent visit to the U.S. as cordial hospitality accorded to him. But it was the height of shame on him. He does not know yet why chief executives of other countries refrain from visiting the department.
					
					 If he was accorded hospitality in the U.S., it was in return for betraying the people's dignity and their interests and serving the purpose of the U.S. chief executive to make the next presidential election favorable for him through the successful conclusion of the FTA.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive is sadly mistaken if he calculates he can tide over his ruling crisis with the backing of his master.

articles.title: Intensive Struggle against FTA Conclusion Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Intensive Struggle against FTA Conclusion Declared in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement held a press conference on Thursday at a press center in Seoul to oppose the conclusion of humiliating agreement with the U.S.
					
					 Speakers at the conference said that if the FTA is concluded with the U.S., the south Korean agriculture will go to ruin.
					
					 They hit the authorities for getting hell-bent on the conclusion of FTA that will drive the people's existence to the brink of a cliff.
					
					 They declared that the people from all walks of life would unite and turn out in an intensive action to check passage of the "motion calling for the ratification of FTA" through the "National Assembly".
					
					 A "declaration of personages of various strata opposing the ratification of south Korea-U.S. FTA" in the name of 1,519 people was read out at the conference.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind Irregularities Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Irregularities Urged in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea in a commentary on Wednesday hit at the irregularities of Ra Kyong Won, a lawmaker from the "Grand National Party" who declared his candidacy for Seoul mayor.
					
					 Ra admitted that he had received huge bribes under the pretext of political support fund from teachers of various schools which are in his father's possession and where he is active as a director.
					
					 Recalling this fact, the commentary said:
					
					 He has claimed that the prescription of accusation expired since such bribery happened in early days when he was elected as a lawmaker.
					
					 But, there is suspicion that he committed similar crimes later.
					
					 When taking into account the features of a private school whose right of personnel management belongs to the chief of its Board, nobody thinks that such bribery was voluntarily done by teachers.
					
					 The prosecution has dismissed every case of the GNP group which took political support fund from teachers. But, this time it should make prompt and clear investigation, mindful that the people would never pardon it if it glosses over Ra's crimes.
					
					 The commentary urged Ra to lay bare the truth behind his wrongdoings.

articles.title: GNP's Attempt to Conclude FTA Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
GNP's Attempt to Conclude FTA Flailed in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea in a press conference on Wednesday hit at the "Grand National Party's" imprudent attempt to conclude the humiliating "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S. 
					
					 The GNP is trying to railroad a "motion calling for ratification of the FTA" through the "National Assembly", the spokesman noted, adding:
					
					 Especially, it speaks ill of the opposition parties standing against the motion.
					
					 The people know well that the GNP had used violence at the NA to pass fascist laws in the past. 
					
					 This group's slanders against the opposition parties remind one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" 
					
					 The Democratic Labor Party can never agree with the humiliating agreement that will serve only for the privileged circle which accounts for one percent of the population.
					
					 If the GNP truly wants to serve the people, it should dismiss those who pushed forward negotiations for the conclusion of the agreement according to the U.S. intention.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Hit for His Wrong Deed over Comfort Women Issue
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Hit for His Wrong Deed over Comfort Women Issue

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Permanent representative Yun Mi Hyang and co-representative Han Kuk Yom of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea released a joint statement on Thursday to accuse the chief executive of downplaying the issue of Japan's liquidation of the past.
					
					 At the talks with Japan's prime minister on Wednesday the chief executive of south Korea made no mention of the settlement of the issue of comfort women for the imperial Japanese army, the statement charged.
					
					 Referring to a Japanese newspaper's report that this issue was not brought up for discussion at the talks by the south Korean ruler's judgment, it said:
					
					 After all, through the talks he kept his principle that "he doesn't want to ask apology and reflection from Japan for matured south Korea-Japan relations".
					
					 We can hardly repress anger at his behavior that ignored the demand for solution to the comfort women issue made by its victims for some decades.
					
					 It is deception to call for peaceful future without settling the past.

articles.title: U.S.-resident Koreans Hit at S. Korean Chief Executive's Sycophancy
articles.content:
U.S.-resident Koreans Hit at S. Korean Chief Executive's Sycophancy

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an Internet paper run by the Koreans in the United States, carried an article on October 17 to criticize the south Korean chief executive for his kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 During his recent tour of the U.S. the chief executive of south Korea zealously hailed the conclusion of FTA with the U.S., strongly opposed by the south Koreans. He described it as "epochal success" in economic alliance with the U.S. as well as in military tie-up. 
					
					 Recalling this fact, the article said:
					
					 As for FTA, it is nothing but an act of asking for south Korea's economic dependence on the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean authorities seek to leave the economy, culture and all other realms of society entirely to the U.S.
					
					 Worse still, the south Korean chief executive made no mention of apology from the U.S. over the sexual assault crimes committed by its imperialist aggressor troops present in south Korea and amendment to the unequal south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement".
					
					 He is taking only the pro-American sycophantic stand and the south Korean "government" has lost popular support.

articles.title: Songun Politics of WPK Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Songun Politics of WPK Praised in Foreign Countries

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Democratic Congo, Bangladesh, Norway, Peru, South Africa, Nigeria, Guinea, Malaysia, Indonesia, Myanmar and India and those were held by the Pan-African Movement Secretariat and the FIFA Regional Development Office from Oct. 6 to 14 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 85th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					
					 Gaspar Kabongo, deputy secretary of the National Executive Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo, said that it is thanks to the Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il that the WPK has won victory after victory in the face of fierce confrontation with imperialism. 
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, and other speakers at events said that the history of the WPK is a glorious one of its wise leadership over the cause of independence of the popular masses despite all ordeals. 
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, Alberto Moreno, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), and Felix Fernandes Torres, secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, highly praised the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in building and developing the WPK. 
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea said the programme of the DIU became the foundation of the programme of the WPK and its principle of independence guidelines for the building of the WPK and its activities. 
					
					 The Korean people under the guidance of the WPK, successor to the tradition of the DIU, will emerge victorious in the future, too, he stressed. 
					
					 An officer of the FIFA Regional Development Office said that whenever he visited the DPRK he could witness the fact that the Korean people achieved big progress under the party's leadership. The single-minded unity of the Korean people has been a factor of winning steady victories despite all difficulties, he added. 
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Norway and South Africa.

articles.title: Russian and Nigerian Papers Observe DIU Anniversary
articles.content:
Russian and Nigerian Papers Observe DIU Anniversary

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Russian and Nigerian newspapers carried special write-ups on the 85th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU). 
					
					 The 38th issue of the Russian paper Patriot carried an article titled "Pioneer of Revolution" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung and a picture of the President standing together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Recalling that the President formed the DIU with young vanguard fighters of Korea 85 years ago, the article went on:
					
					 The Korean revolution which originated from the DIU has vigorously advanced along the road of independence, Songun and unity. 
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The DIU considered unity as its life and soul and made a new history of unity and cohesion centered on the leader. 
					
					 Socialist Korea dignified with its independence, powerful with its Songun and invincible with its single-minded unity will always enjoy victory and glory. 
					
					 The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on Oct. 12 said in an article titled "85th Anniversary of DIU Formation" that Songun is the invariable banner of the Korean revolution as it thoroughly embodied the idea of anti-imperialist struggle. 
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il provided the DPRK with a sure guarantee for weathering all difficulties and winning victories generation after generation, the paper added.

articles.title: 85th Anniversary of DIU Marked in UK
articles.content:
85th Anniversary of DIU Marked in UK

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Oct. 15 on the 85th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union. 
					
					 The statement said President Kim Il Sung formed the DIU 85 years ago, making it possible for the Korean revolution to greet a period of a new historic turn. 
					
					 The formation of the DIU, the first organization of young vanguard fighters in Korea, was an epoch-making event in the struggle for building a revolutionary party of working class after breaking with the past communist movement ridden with factionalism and flunkeyism, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DIU programme is being successfully implemented by the Workers' Party of Korea and now the WPK is firmly adhering to the guidelines of independence based on the Juche idea under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The WPK deeply rooted among the popular masses, achieved unbreakable unity and cohesion and is now working hard for global independence.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Benin Party Leader
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Benin Party Leader

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, was interviewed by KCNA on Thursday at the end of his visit to the DPRK. 
					
					 He said:
					
					 I was deeply impressed to learn about the history and experience of the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK and developed it into the party winning absolute support and trust from the popular masses. 
					
					 Today the WPK is displaying its dignity under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The WPK has become a model of the progressive parties in the struggle for independence. 
					
					 Denouncing the imperialists for intensifying the moves to stifle the DPRK, he went on:
					
					 The Korean people closely united around the WPK are dynamically advancing under the uplifted banner of Songun. 
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin will earnestly learn from the experience of the WPK which has firmly defended socialism in the forefront of anti-imperialist struggle. 
					
					 I extend full support and solidarity to the just cause of the WPK. 
					
					 I will make positive efforts to further develop the friendly relations between the two parties.

articles.title: Russia's NATO Envoy Threatens Retaliation for US Anti-missile System
articles.content:
Russia's NATO Envoy Threatens Retaliation for US Anti-missile System

					Moscow, October 21 (KCNA) -- Russia is preparing retaliatory measures against the deployment of the U.S. anti-missile system in Eastern Europe, Russian envoy to NATO Dmitry Rogozin said in a news conference Wednesday.
					
					 He also said that talks over the anti-missile defense between Russia and the U.S. have been stalled, because the Americans stubbornly offer things which are very difficult to use on practice.
					
					 "We'll combine the retaliatory steps with the continuation of talks", he declared.

articles.title: Iran Accuses U.S. of Attempting to Ruin Iran's Ties with Arab States
articles.content:
Iran Accuses U.S. of Attempting to Ruin Iran's Ties with Arab States

					 Teheran, October 21 (KCNA) -- Iranian Foreign Minister Ali-Akbar Salehi said Tuesday that Washington's "evil scenario" is intended to tarnish Iran's ties with its Arab neighbors, the local satellite Press TV reported.
					
					 He said that Washington's "scenario" is intended to prop up the unsuccessful coalition of certain Western states to impose illegal sanctions on Iran and to help Washington regain its "lost" position in the sensitive Middle East region, according to Press TV.
					
					 He further cautioned the international community to remain vigilant in the face of such "baseless allegations" which threaten global order, peace and security.
					
					 Salehi emphasized that regional and international stability has always been a top priority in the foreign policy of the Islamic Republic as the country has been a victim of terrorism itself.

articles.title: Cuba Denounces U.S. Blockade
articles.content:
Cuba Denounces U.S. Blockade 

					Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to Santo Domingo Alexis Bandrich Vega denounced on Tuesday the U.S. blockade as a genocide against Cuba and requested solidarity from the Dominicans in this struggle.
					
					 Saying that the U.S. blockade gives Cuba immeasurable sufferings, he branded these acts as national extinction.
					
					 He explained that the blockade has caused 975 billion USD in losses to Cuba and for 20 years the United States has failed to comply with the decision of the UN General Assembly demanding the end of that hostile policy that is in violation of all international regulations, besides failing in its attempt to destroy the Cuban Revolution. 
					
					 Regarding the release of The Cuban Five, as they are internationally known, Bandrich said they continue in prison because Rene Gonzalez, who left prison on October 7, is now under supervised release for three years, banned from returning to Cuba and reuniting with his family.

articles.title: Agreement on Free Trade Zone Concluded
articles.content:
Agreement on Free Trade Zone Concluded

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Heads of member states of the Commonwealth of Independent States signed the agreement on the free trade zone in Sankt－Petersburg, Russia on Oct. 18.
					
					 In this regard Prime Minister Vladimir Putin said in a press interview the conclusion of the agreement would make it possible to take an effective measure to accelerate the development of economy and trade among the member states and lay a firm groundwork for the further development of the commonwealth.

articles.title: Brazil Calls for Reform in UN Economic Body
articles.content:
Agreement on Free Trade Zone Concluded

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Heads of member states of the Commonwealth of Independent States signed the agreement on the free trade zone in Sankt－Petersburg, Russia on Oct. 18.
					
					 In this regard Prime Minister Vladimir Putin said in a press interview the conclusion of the agreement would make it possible to take an effective measure to accelerate the development of economy and trade among the member states and lay a firm groundwork for the further development of the commonwealth.

articles.title: 220 MPs Declare Support for Anti-capitalism Protests
articles.content:
220 MPs Declare Support for Anti-capitalism Protests 

					Tehran, October 21 (KCNA) -- 220 Members of Parliament declared their support for anti-capitalism protests around the world including Occupy Wall Street in a statement they issued on Tuesday. 
					
					 The statement noted that the anti-capitalism protests organized by oppressed laborers, students, retired people around the world go ahead to disclose the hidden hands of one percent governing capitalists who are behind sufferings of the world population. 
					
					 This is heralding the fall of capitalist system.

articles.title: 2 NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
2 NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan 

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Two soldiers with the NATO-led International Security Assistance Force (ISAF) were killed on Wednesday by an improvised explosive device attack in eastern Afghanistan. 
					
					 This made the death toll of NATO soldiers in Afghanistan stand at over 480 this year.

articles.title: Inflation Rate Increases in Britain
articles.content:
Inflation Rate Increases in Britain

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Bills for gas and electricity are up 18.3 percent on the year. Transport has risen 12.8 percent on the year, and food was 6 percent higher, the British Office for National Statistics (ONS) reported on Tuesday.

articles.title: National Strike Hits Greece before Austerity Vote
articles.content:
ational Strike Hits Greece before Austerity Vote

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Greek labor unions launched a 48-hour general strike Wednesday ahead of a crucial parliamentary vote over fresh austerity measures.
					
					The strike was organized by ADEDY and GSEE, the two main umbrella unions of public and private sector employees that represent over 2.5 million workers. 
					
					 They protested against the austerity measures taken by the authorities including tax raise, hike and wage reduction under the name of removing the financial crisis, strongly urging them to retract it at once. 
					
					The strike so far has shut down public sector organizations, schools, courts and hospitals that run on skeleton personnel. Public transport services have been crippled, including airports and ports, as strikers gather in two main squares in central Athens to march towards the parliament.

articles.title: Japan's Crude Steel Output and Store Sales Fall
articles.content:
Japan's Crude Steel Output and Store Sales Fall

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Crude steel production in September fell 3.8 percent from a year earlier to 8.88 million tons, an industry body said Wednesday.
					
					 Meanwhile, Japan's department store sales in September dropped 2.4 percent from a year earlier on a same-store basis for the third straight month of decline partly because lingering late-summer heat dissuaded people from buying autumn clothing.

articles.title: Declaration on Situation Issued
articles.content:
Declaration on Situation Issued

					 Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Information Department of the Central Committee of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front made public a declaration on the situation on Oct. 18 in denunciation of the racket of fascist suppression kicked up by the south Korean conservative authorities, according to internet site "Kuguk Jonson."
					
					 The declaration said: 
					
					 A lot of pro-reunification patriotic personages and democratic forces are indiscriminately suppressed on charges of being "spies", "Reds" and "left-wing elements" and even those calling for the right to existence and the right to learn are arrested on groundless charges. This is the tragic reality of south Korea swept by the whirlwind of fascism. 
					
					 Such whirlwind of brutal suppression kicked off by the conservative ruling authorities, the one reminiscent of the horrifying period of the Yusin dictatorship, is part of the despicable plots to tide over the serious ruling crisis caused by their treacherous, anti-reunification and unpopular policies and, furthermore, lay a springboard for their stay in power through the "National Assembly" election and the "presidential" election next year.
					
					 The present conservative regime sold off not only political and military interests but even economic sovereignty to the U.S. through servile and tributary diplomacy, the kind of which can hardly be found in the history of international politics. It is staging almost every day exercises for a war of aggression against compatriots in the north in collusion with outside forces, rendering the situation extremely tense and bringing the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase.
					
					 Noting that it is the south Korean people who are responsible for paving the way for achieving independence and reunification, democracy and people's welfare, the declaration called upon all the people to get united as one and turn out in the struggle to shatter the conservative ruling forces' suppression of the forces for progressive reforms.
					
					 It also urged the people of various strata to launch a dynamic mass movement to fully probe the truth behind various conspiratorial cases cooked up by the ruling conservative forces, punish the chief culprits of fabrications and seek the release of the arrested and detained pro-reunification patriotic figures.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de Unidad no. 985 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de Unidad no. 985 del EPC 

					　Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Comandancia de la Unidad no. 985 del EPC. 
					
					　Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, el Comandante Supremo recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial, guiado por los miembros de mando. 
					
					　Recordo a los militares de la compania de Paek Kye Sun, con quienes se habia reunido en marzo de 1966 durante su visita a la unidad junto con el Presidente Kim Il Sung. Vio la foto del Presidente tomada en aquel dia inolvidable junto a un soldado y recordo con emocion el trayecto combativo de la unidad. 
					
					　Luego de enterarse del cumplimiento del deber de la unidad, recorrio la sala de leccion militar, donde se cercioro del entrenamiento de los oficiales y miembros del Estado Mayor. 
					
					　Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los oficiales y los miembros del Estado Mayor de la unidad libran con dinamismo los ejercicios para armarse firmemente con la idea estrategica y tactica militar y metodos de combate autoctonos del Partido y se preparan para cumplir con habilidad cualquier mision combativa dificil. 
					
					  Acto seguido, en la Casa de los Militares y la biblioteca hizo conocimiento de la educacion ideo-politica para los militares, y en el comedor de los militares de la subunidad adscrita directamente averiguo con afecto paternal la vida alimentaria de los soldados. 
					
					   Al ver con atencion minuciosa los alimentos diarios y subsidiarios puestos en mesa de la cocina, pregunto en detalles por el cultivo de soya de este ano y la cantidad de suministro diario de soya y carne. 
					
					  El mismo dia, el Comandante Supremo hizo una visita al lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Koakol, situado en el area de estacionamiento de la unidad.  
					
					  Recordo lleno de gran emocion las imborrables proezas del Presidente quien durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, con su inteligencia clarividente y destreza militar, frustro la "nueva ofensiva" de los imperialistas norteamericanos y abrio la coyuntura de viraje de la guerra. 
					
					　Aprecio que los militares de la unidad con el alma de fidelidad hacen esfuerzos por conservar en estado original este lugar de interes historico-revolucionario donde estan impregnadas las nobles huellas del Presidente. 
					
					　Volvio a evaluar a todos los oficiales y soldados de la unidad que cumplen con toda responsabilidad la guardia avanzada vigilando alertamente las maniobras agresivas de los enemigos, e indico las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para fortalecer por todos los medios la capacidad combativa de la unidad. 
					
					　La Unidad debe desplegar los ejercicios como en la guerra real y preparar a todos los oficiales y soldados como combatientes sin rivales que apoyan con las armas la voluntad del Songun del Partido, y al mismo tiempo, debe mejorar el mando y la administracion de la unidad y establecer la disciplina militar de acero mostrando sin reservas el impetu combativo y el aspecto del poderoso ejercito revolucionario de flor y nata, enseno. 
					
					　El Comandante Supremo se fotografio junto a los militares de la unidad. 
					
					　Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Kim Kyong Ok, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Hwang Pyong So, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Granja de Cerdos de Kwangdok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Granja de Cerdos de Kwangdok

					　Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja de Cerdos de Kwangdok.
					
					　Le acompanaron Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN y Kim Kyong Ok, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.
					
					　Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano, el Dirigente fue a la sala de presentacion del historial, donde recordo con gran emocion la orgullosa trayectoria recorrida por la granja bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					　El Presidente visito el 30 de noviembre de 1971 esta granja de cerdos nuevamente construida e ilumino el camino a seguir por la granja, dijo el Comandante Supremo y agrego que la abnegacion y los esfuerzos del Presidente estan impregnados en todas las localidades del pais.
					
					　Dio revista a la sala de control general, el edificio de engorde, el de parto y otros lugares haciendo detallado conocimiento del estado de modernizacion, dotacion tecnologica, cria y cuida de cerdos y procesamiento de carne.
					
					　Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los miembros partidistas y otros trabajadores de la granja terminaron en un corto plazo la obra de reconstruccion y modernizacion de enorme dimension y aumentan la produccion de carne y otros elaborados y evaluo altamente sus meritos.
					
					　En el edificio No.9 de engorde visitada por el Presidente, el Dirigente miro con satisfaccion cuantiosos cerdos gordos e indico la necesidad de  tomar las medidas de aseguramiento de temperatura y establecer el sistema de ventilacion. 
					
					　Dando vueltas por el edificio de parto con capacidad anual de 20 mil lechones se entero minuciosamente de hibridacion y variedades.
					
					  Evaluo que la granja construyo la base de cria de insectos proteicos conforme a sus caracteristicas y normaliza la produccion.
					
					　Mostrandose muy satisfecho de que acondiciono la base de elaboracion de carne con capacidad de mas de 200 toneladas al ano incluyendo la conserva de carne de puerco, jamon y salchicha, subrayo que debe producir mucho los productos elaborados de carne como la conserva preferida especialmente por los militares.
					
					　Expreso reiteradamente satisfaccion de que los funcionarios y los empleados de la granja hayan asegurado la firme base capaz de realizar la cientifizacion de la produccion de la carne de cerdo conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo y mejorar la vida alimentaria de los militares y presento las tareas que se presentan en la administracion de la granja.
					
					　Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y los empleados de la granja produciran y suministraran mucho mas la carne y productos elaborados a los militares al esforzarse activamente por materializar la politica del partido en  materia de ganaderia.

articles.title: Banquete en honor de innovadores de provincia de Hamgyong del Sur
articles.content:
Banquete en honor de innovadores de provincia de Hamgyong del Sur

					　Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecieron el dia 21 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo un banquete en honor de los funcionarios, innovadores laborales, cientificos y tecnicos de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					　Participaron en la ocasion Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC y funcionarios del CC del PTC junto a ellos.
					
					　Choe Thae Bok en su discurso senalo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo que los innovadores  visiten varios lugares y presencien la funcion y ofrecio el solemne banquete.
					
					　Subrayo que durante su visita de orientacion el Dirigente les estimulo a hacer el trabajo de manera  ambiciosa con audacia y cuando ellos lograron exitos les evaluo altamente.
					
					　Los funcionarios, innovadores laborales, cientificos y tecnicos de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur deberan compartir la idea, el proposito, la vida y el destino con el Dirigente y materializar cabalmente las tareas dadas por el, puntualizo.
					
					　Tambien deberan ser vanguardistas en el sagrado empeno por mejorar la vida del pueblo y abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera y corresponder a la gran confianza del Dirigente, destaco.
					
					　En el banquete hubo la funcion de la Banda Musical Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae.

articles.title: Cuadros recorren varias fabricas
articles.content:
Cuadros recorren varias fabricas 

					　Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y otros funcionarios directivos del partido y el Estado, y los funcionarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Consejo de Ministros, los ministerios, los organos centrales y las organizaciones sociales hicieron recorrido la vispera por la Granja de Cerdos Taedonggang, la Planta de Tortugas Taedonggang y la Fabrica de Red Taedonggang, nuevamente construidas.
					
					　Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano en la Granja de Cerdos Taedonggang, los visitantes pasaron revista a la sala de control general, los corrales de fecundacion y parto, la fabrica de elaboracion de carne y otros lugares de la granja.
					
					　Expresaron sus admiraciones viendo el funcionamiento de todos los procesos dirigidos por computadoras.
					
					　Escuchando en la planta de tortugas las explicaciones sobre el hecho de que gracias a la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il se ha levantado magnificamente la base integral de cria de tortugas, recorrieron las lagunas de tortugas bajo techo y al aire libre y otros puntos.
					
					　Tambien visitaron la Fabrica de Red Taedonggang que produce diferentes mallas desde el proceso de produccion modernizada y sofisticados equipos.

articles.title: Entidad juvenil del Norte denuncia la represion fascista del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Entidad juvenil del Norte denuncia la represion fascista del Sur de Corea

					　Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la subcomision de los Jovenes y Estudiantes del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio publico el dia 22 una declaracion de condena a la banda traidora del Sur de Corea que reprime de manera fascista a los relacionados con las entidades de jovenes y estudiantes patrioticos que han tomado la delantera de la lucha por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.
					
					　La nota lo califica de un siniestro desafio a la aspiracion y el deseo de todos los connacionales  a la reunificacion y de imperdonable acto antinacional que pisotean la discusion y las actividades por la reunificacion, y continua:
					
					　Ella trata como delincuentes falsificando los casos como si hubieran recibido la "orden" de alguien a los interesados de las entidades juveniles y estudiantiles quienes hace anos realizaron legalmente el contacto con la parte de la RPDC bajo la aprobacion del "poder" anterior.
					
					　Esto muestra claramente que la banda traidora esta enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida y las artimanas.
					
					　La represion fascista de la banda titere parte del malsano intento de arreglar la grave crisis de dominio y realizar la prolongacion del poder creando en el territorio surcoreano el ambiente horroroso y exterminando la lucha de los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					　Pero, esto es el esfuerzo desesperado de quienes estan condenados por la opinion publica debido al fracaso de la politica conflictiva anti-RPDC, la de servilismo a grandes potencias, vendepatria y antipopular, lo que suscita solo la indignacion de los jovenes, los estudiantes y los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					　Todos los jovenes y estudiantes surcoreanos deberan levantarse energicamente como vanguardistas en la lucha por aniquilar a la banda traidora junto con los habitantes de distintos sectores.
					
					　La banda titere debe poner fin de inmediato a la represion a los jovenes y los estudiantes patrioticos y los habitantes surcoreanos.

articles.title: Competencia de futbol entre Corea y Brasil
articles.content:
Competencia de futbol entre Corea y Brasil

					　Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado en el capitalino Estadio Kim Il Sung la  competencia de futbol (m) entre la seleccion Pothonggang de Corea y la del Club Atletico Sorocaba de Brasil.
					
					　La seleccion coreana vencio a la brasilena por 2 a 0.
					
					　El equipo brasileno tambien habia competido con el coreano en esta capital en noviembre de 2009 y octubre de 2010.
